arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱلرَّسُولَ وَأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَمْرِ مِنكُمْ ۖ فَإِن تَنَـٰزَعْتُمْ فِى شَىْءٍۢ فَرُدُّوهُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَٱلرَّسُولِ إِن كُنتُمْ تُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌۭ وَأَحْسَنُ تَأْوِيلًا
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Obey	Allah and	the	Noble	Messenger	and	those	amongst	you	who	are	in	
authority;	so	if	there	is	a	dispute	amongst	you	concerning	any	matter,	refer	it	to Allah and	the	
Noble	Messenger	(for	judgement)	if	you	believe	in	Allah and	the	Last	Day;	this	is	better	and	has	
the	best	outcome.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wālo!	Hukm	māno	Allah	ka	aur	hukm	māno	Rasool	ka	aur	unka	jo	tum	meiñ	hukumat	
wāle	haiñ	phir	agar	tum	meiñ	kisi	bāt	ka	jhagadā	uthe	to	usey	Allah	wa Rasool	ke	huzoor	ruju'	
karo	 agar	 Allah	 aur	 Qayāmat	 par	 Imān	 rakhte	 ho	 aur	 yeh	 behtar	 hai	 aur	 iskā	 anjām	 sab	 se	
achcha

arabicText: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يَزْعُمُونَ أَنَّهُمْ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ مِن قَبْلِكَ يُرِيدُونَ أَن يَتَحَاكَمُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلطَّـٰغُوتِ وَقَدْ أُمِرُوٓا۟ أَن يَكْفُرُوا۟ بِهِۦ وَيُرِيدُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ أَن يُضِلَّهُمْ ضَلَـٰلًۢا بَعِيدًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Did	you	not	see	those	whose	claim	is	that	
they	believe	in	what	has	been	sent	down	
on	 you	 and	 what	 was	 sent	 down	 before	
you,	and	they	then	wish	to	make	the	devil	
their	judge,	whereas	they	were	ordered	to	
completely	 reject	 him?	 And	 the	 devil	
wishes	to	mislead	them	far	astray.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	tum	ne	unheiñ	na	dekhā	Jin	ka	da'wa	
hai	 ke	 woh	 Imān	 lāye	 us	 par	 jo	 tumhāri	
taraf	utra	aur	us	par	jo	 tum	se	pahle	utra	
phir	chāhte	haiñ	ke	shaitān	ko	apna	panch	
banāyeiñ	aur	unko	to	hukm	ye	tha	ke	usey	
aslan	na	māneiñ	aur	Iblees	yeh	chāhta	hai	
ke	unheiñ	door	behkā	de

arabicText: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَعَالَوْا۟ إِلَىٰ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ وَإِلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ رَأَيْتَ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ يَصُدُّونَ عَنكَ صُدُودًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	 when	 they	 are	 told,	 “Come	 towards	
the	 Book	 sent	 down	 by	 Allah and	 to	 the	
Noble	 Messenger,”	 you	 will	 see	 that	 the	
hypocrites	 turn	 their	 faces	 away	 from	
you
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jab	 unse	 kahā	 jāye	 ke Allah	 ki	 utāri	
Kitāb	aur	Rasool	ki	taraf	āao	to	tum	dekho	
ge	ke	munāfiq	tum	se	muñh	mod	kar	phir	
jāte	haiñ

arabicText: فَكَيْفَ إِذَآ أَصَـٰبَتْهُم مُّصِيبَةٌۢ بِمَا قَدَّمَتْ أَيْدِيهِمْ ثُمَّ جَآءُوكَ يَحْلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ إِنْ أَرَدْنَآ إِلَّآ إِحْسَـٰنًۭا وَتَوْفِيقًا
englishTranslationText:
What	will	be	 their	state,	if	some	calamity	
befalls	them	as	a	result	of	what their	own	
hands	 have	 sent	 before	 them	- and	 then	
they	 come	 to	 you	 (O	 dear	 Prophet	
Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	be	upon	
him),	 swearing	 by	 Allah that,	 “Our	 goal	
was	 only	 to	 do	 good	 and	 create	
harmony"?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kaisi	hogi	jab	unpar	koi	uftād	(Museebat)	
pade	 badla	 uskā	 jo	 unke	 hāthoñ	 ne	 āage	
bhejā	 phir	 aey	 Mehboob tumhāre	 huzoor	
hāzir	hoñ	Allah	ki	qasam	khāte	ke	hamāra	
maqsood	to	bhalāi	aur	mel	hi	tha.

arabicText: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَعْلَمُ ٱللَّهُ مَا فِى قُلُوبِهِمْ فَأَعْرِضْ عَنْهُمْ وَعِظْهُمْ وَقُل لَّهُمْ فِىٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ قَوْلًۢا بَلِيغًۭا
englishTranslationText:
The	secrets	of	their	hearts	are	well	known	
to	 Allah; so	 avoid	 them	 and	 explain	 to	
them,	 and	 speak	 to	 them	 clearly	 in	 their	
affairs.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Unke	diloñ	 ki	 to	 bāt	Allah	jānta	 hai	 to	 tum	 un	 se	 chashm	poshi	 karo	aur	 unheiñ	 samjhāo	aur	
unke	mu'āmle	meiñ	unse	rasā	(Asar	karne	wāli)	bāt	kaho

arabicText: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا لِيُطَاعَ بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَلَوْ أَنَّهُمْ إِذ ظَّلَمُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ جَآءُوكَ فَٱسْتَغْفَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱسْتَغْفَرَ لَهُمُ ٱلرَّسُولُ لَوَجَدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ تَوَّابًۭا رَّحِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	We	did	not	send	any	Noble	Messenger	except	that	he	be	obeyed	by	Allah’s	command;	and	if	
they,	 when	 they	 have	 wronged	 their	 own	 souls,	 come	 humbly	 to	 you	 (O	 dear	 Prophet	
Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him)	and	seek	forgiveness	from	Allah,	and	the	Noble	
Messenger	 intercedes	 for	 them,	 they	 will	 certainly	 find	 Allah as	 the	 Most	 Acceptor	 Of	
Repentance,	the	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	ham	ne	koi	Rasool	na	bhejā	magar	is	liye	ke	Allah	ke	hukm	se	uski	ita‘at	ki	jāye	aur	agar	jab	
woh	apni	jānoñ	par	zulm	 kareiñ	 to	aey	Mehboob tumhāre	huzoor	hāzir	hoñ	aur	phir	Allah	 se	
mu'āfi	chāheiñ	aur	Rasool	unki	shafa'at	farmāyeiñ	to	zaroor	Allah	ko	bahut	tauba	qabool	karne	
wāla	maherbān	pāyeiñ

arabicText: فَلَا وَرَبِّكَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ حَتَّىٰ يُحَكِّمُوكَ فِيمَا شَجَرَ بَيْنَهُمْ ثُمَّ لَا يَجِدُوا۟ فِىٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ حَرَجًۭا مِّمَّا قَضَيْتَ وَيُسَلِّمُوا۟ تَسْلِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
So	O	dear	Prophet	(Muhammad - peace	and	blessings be	upon	him),	by	oath	of	your	Lord,	they	
will	not	be	Muslims	until	 they	appoint	 you	a	judge	 for	 the	disputes	between	 them	- and	 then	
whatever	you	have	decided,	they	should	not	find	opposition	to	it	within	their	hearts,	and	they	
must	accept	it	wholeheartedly.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	aey	Mehboob tumhāre	Rab	ki	qasam	woh	Musalman	na	hoñ	ge	jab	tak	apne	āpas	ke	jhagrde	
meiñ	 tumheiñ	 hākim	 na	 banāyeiñ	 phir	 jo	 kuch	 tum	 hukm	 farmādo	 apne	 diloñ	 meiñ	 us	 se	
rukāwat	na	pāyeiñ	aur	jee se	mān	leiñ

arabicText: وَلَوْ أَنَّا كَتَبْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ أَنِ ٱقْتُلُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَكُمْ أَوِ ٱخْرُجُوا۟ مِن دِيَـٰرِكُم مَّا فَعَلُوهُ إِلَّا قَلِيلٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ ۖ وَلَوْ أَنَّهُمْ فَعَلُوا۟ مَا يُوعَظُونَ بِهِۦ لَكَانَ خَيْرًۭا لَّهُمْ وَأَشَدَّ تَثْبِيتًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	 had	 We	 decreed	 for	 them	 to	 slay	
themselves	 or	 to	 leave	 their	 homes	 and	
families,	 only	 a	 few	 of	 them	 would	 have	
done	 it;	 and	 if	 they	 did	 what	 they	 are	
advised	to,	it	would	be	good	for	them,	and	
would	have	strengthened	faith
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 agar	Hum	 un	 par	 farz	 karte	 ke	 apne	
āp	ko	qatl	kardo	 ya	apne	ghar	wār	chord	
kar	 nikal	 jāo	 to	 un	 meiñ	 thode	 hi	 aisā	
karte	aur	agar	woh	karte	jis	bāt	ki	unheiñ	
nasihat	 di	 jāti	 hai	 to	 us	 meiñ	 unka	 bhalā	
tha	aur	Imān	par	khoob	jamna.

arabicText: وَإِذًۭا لَّـَٔاتَيْنَـٰهُم مِّن لَّدُنَّآ أَجْرًا عَظِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	 were	 it	 so,	 We	 would	 bestow	 upon	
them	a	great	reward	from	Ourselves.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	aisā	hota	 to	zaroor	ham	unheiñ	apne	
pās	se	badā	sawāb	dete

arabicText: وَلَهَدَيْنَـٰهُمْ صِرَٰطًۭا مُّسْتَقِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	 would	 certainly	 guide	 them	 to	 the	
Straight	Path.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 zaroor	 unko	 seedhi	 rāh	 ki	 hidāyat	
karte.

arabicText: وَمَن يُطِعِ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلرَّسُولَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ مَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنْعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِم مِّنَ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ وَٱلصِّدِّيقِينَ وَٱلشُّهَدَآءِ وَٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ ۚ وَحَسُنَ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ رَفِيقًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	 whoever	 obeys	 Allah and	 His	 Noble	
Messenger,	will	be	with	those	upon	whom	
Allah has	 bestowed	 grace	 - that	 is,	 the	
Prophets	and	the	truthful	and	the	martyrs	
and	 the	 virtuous;	 and	 what	 excellent	
companions	they	are!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jo	 Allah	 aur	 uske	 Rasool	 ka	 hukm	
māne	 to	 usey	 unka	 sāth	 milega	 jin	 par	
Allah	 ne	 fazl	 kiya	 y‘ani	 Ambiya	 aur	
Siddeeq	aur	Shaheed	aur	Nek	log	aur	yeh	
kya	hi	achche	sāthi	haiñ.

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَضْلُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ عَلِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
This	 is	 Allah’s	 munificence;	 and	 Allah is	
Sufficient,	the	All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	Allah	ka	fazl	hai	aur	Allah	kāfi	hai	jān	
ne	wāla

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ خُذُوا۟ حِذْرَكُمْ فَٱنفِرُوا۟ ثُبَاتٍ أَوِ ٱنفِرُوا۟ جَمِيعًۭا
englishTranslationText:
O	 People	 who	 Believe!	 Be	 cautious,	 then	
advance	 towards	 the	 enemy	 in	 small	
numbers	or	all	together.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Imān	wālo!	Hoshiyāri	se	kām	lo	phir	
dushman	ki	taraf	thode	thode	hokar	niklo	
ya	ikhat-the	chalo.

arabicText: وَإِنَّ مِنكُمْ لَمَن لَّيُبَطِّئَنَّ فَإِنْ أَصَـٰبَتْكُم مُّصِيبَةٌۭ قَالَ قَدْ أَنْعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىَّ إِذْ لَمْ أَكُن مَّعَهُمْ شَهِيدًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	 among	 you	 is	 one	 who	 will	
certainly	 loiter	 behind;	 then	 if	 some	
disaster	were	to	befall	you,	he	would	say,	
“It	 was	Allah’s	 grace	 upon	me	 that	 I	 was	
not	present	with	them!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 tum	meiñ	 koi	woh	 hai	 ke	 zaroor	 der	
lagāye	 ga	 phir agar	 tum	 par	 koi	 uftād	
(Museebat)	 pade	 to	 kahe	Khuda	 ka	mujh	
par	ehsān	tha	ke	maiñ	un	ke	sāth	hāzir	na	
tha.

arabicText: وَلَئِنْ أَصَـٰبَكُمْ فَضْلٌۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ لَيَقُولَنَّ كَأَن لَّمْ تَكُنۢ بَيْنَكُمْ وَبَيْنَهُۥ مَوَدَّةٌۭ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى كُنتُ مَعَهُمْ فَأَفُوزَ فَوْزًا عَظِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	were	you	 to	receive	Allah’s	munificence	(a	bounty),	he	would	surely	say	- as	if	 there	had	
been	no	 friendship	between	you	and	him	- “Alas	- if	only	 I	had	been	with	 them,	 I	would	have	
achieved	a	great	success!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	tumheiñ	Allah	ka	fazl	mile	to	zaroor	kahe	goya	tum	meiñ	us	meiñ	koi	dosti	na	thi	aey	
kāsh	maiñ	unke	sāth	hota	to	badi	murād	pāta.

arabicText: ۞ فَلْيُقَـٰتِلْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَشْرُونَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۚ وَمَن يُقَـٰتِلْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَيُقْتَلْ أَوْ يَغْلِبْ فَسَوْفَ نُؤْتِيهِ أَجْرًا عَظِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
So	 those	who	 sell	 the	life	 of	 this	world	 for	 the	Hereafter,	must	 fight	in	Allah's	 cause;	and	We	
shall	bestow	a	great	reward	upon	whoever	fights	in	Allah's	cause,	whether	he	is	martyred	or	is	
victorious.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. To	unheiñ	Allah	ki	rāh	meiñ	ladna	chāhiye	jo	duniya	ki	zindagi	bech	kar	Ākhirat	lete	haiñ	aur	jo	
Allah	ki	rāh	meiñ	lade	phir	māra	jāye	ya	ghālib	āye	to	an-qareeb	ham	usey	badā	sawāb	deñge

arabicText: وَمَا لَكُمْ لَا تُقَـٰتِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلْمُسْتَضْعَفِينَ مِنَ ٱلرِّجَالِ وَٱلنِّسَآءِ وَٱلْوِلْدَٰنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ أَخْرِجْنَا مِنْ هَـٰذِهِ ٱلْقَرْيَةِ ٱلظَّالِمِ أَهْلُهَا وَٱجْعَل لَّنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ وَلِيًّۭا وَٱجْعَل لَّنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ نَصِيرًا
englishTranslationText:
And	what	is	the	matter	with	you,	that	you	
should	 not	 fight	 in	 Allah’s	 cause	 and	 for	
the	feeble	men,	and	women,	and	children,	
who	invoke,	 “Our	 Lord!	 Liberate	 us	 from	
this	town,	the	people	of	which	are	unjust;	
and	give	us	a	protector	from	Yourself;	and	
give	us	a	supporter	from	Yourself.”	(Allah
has	 created	 many	 supporters	 for	 the	
believers.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	tumheiñ	kiya	huwa	ke	na	lado	Allah	ki	
rāh	meiñ	aur	 kamzor	mardoñ	aur	aurtoñ	
aur	 bachchoñ	 ke	 wāste	 jo	 yeh	 dua	 kar	
rahe	 haiñ	 ke	 aey	 Rab	 hamāre	 hameiñ	 is	
basti	 se	 nikāl	 jiske	 log	 zālim	 haiñ	 aur	
hameiñ	apne	pās	se	koi	himāyati	de	de	aur	
hameiñ	apne	pās	se	koi	madad-gār	de	de.

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ يُقَـٰتِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يُقَـٰتِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱلطَّـٰغُوتِ فَقَـٰتِلُوٓا۟ أَوْلِيَآءَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ ۖ إِنَّ كَيْدَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ كَانَ ضَعِيفًا
englishTranslationText:
The	 believers	 fight	 for	Allah’s	 cause;	 and	
the	disbelievers	fight	for	the	devil’s	cause	
- so	 fight	against	 the	 friends	 of	 the	 devil;	
undoubtedly	 the	 devil’s	 conspiracy	 is	
weak
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Imān	 wāle	 Allah	 ki	 rāh	 meiñ	 ladte	 haiñ	
aur	 kuffar	 shaitān	 ki	 rāh	meiñ	ladte	 haiñ	
to	 shaitān	 ke	 dostoñ	 se	 lado	 beshak	
shaitān	ka	dāo	kamzor	hai.

arabicText: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ قِيلَ لَهُمْ كُفُّوٓا۟ أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ فَلَمَّا كُتِبَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْقِتَالُ إِذَا فَرِيقٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ يَخْشَوْنَ ٱلنَّاسَ كَخَشْيَةِ ٱللَّهِ أَوْ أَشَدَّ خَشْيَةًۭ ۚ وَقَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا لِمَ كَتَبْتَ عَلَيْنَا ٱلْقِتَالَ لَوْلَآ أَخَّرْتَنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍۢ قَرِيبٍۢ ۗ قُلْ مَتَـٰعُ ٱلدُّنْيَا قَلِيلٌۭ وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌۭ لِّمَنِ ٱتَّقَىٰ وَلَا تُظْلَمُونَ فَتِيلًا
englishTranslationText:
Did	 you	 not	 see	 those	 to	 whom	 it	 was	
said,	 “Restrain	 your	 hands,	 keep	 the	
prayer	 established	 and	 pay	 the	 charity”;	
but	when	fighting	was	ordained	for	them,	
some	 of	 them	 started	 fearing	 people,	 the	
way	 they	 feared	 Allah - or	 even	 greater!	
And	 they	 said,	 “Our	 Lord!	Why	 have	 You	
ordained	 fighting	 for	 us?	 If	 only	 You	
would	have	let	us	live	some	more!”	Say	(O	
dear	 Prophet	 Muhammad - peace	 and	
blessings	be	upon	him),	“The	usage	of	this	
world	 is	 meagre;	 and	 the	 Hereafter	 is	
better	 for	 the	 pious;	 and	 you	 will	 not	 be	
wronged	 even	 (the	 weight	 of)	 a	 single	
thread.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	 tumne	 unheiñ	 na	 dekha	 jinse	 kahā	
gaya	 apne	 hāth	 rok	 lo	 aur	 Namāz	 qāim	
rakho	 aur	Zakāt	 do	 phir	jab	 un	 par	jihād	
farz	 kiya	 gaya	 to	 un	 meiñ	 b'az	 logoñ	 se	
aisa	darne	lage	jaise	Allah	se	dare	ya	us	se	
bhi	 zāid	 aur	 bole	 aey	 Rab	 hamāre	 tu	 ne	
ham	 par	 jihād	 kiyuñ	 farz	 kar	 diya	 thodi	
muddat	 tak	 hameiñ	 aur	 jeene	 diya	 hota	
tum	farmā	do	ke	duniya	ka	baratna	thoda	
hai	 aur	 dar	 wāloñ	 ke	 liye	 Ākhirat	 achchi	
aur	tum	par	tāge	barābar	zulm	na	hoga.

arabicText: أَأَيْنَمَا تَكُونُوا۟ يُدْرِككُّمُ ٱلْمَوْتُ وَلَوْ كُنتُمْ فِى بُرُوجٍۢ مُّشَيَّدَةٍۢ ۗ وَإِن تُصِبْهُمْ حَسَنَةٌۭ يَقُولُوا۟ هَـٰذِهِۦ مِنْ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ وَإِن تُصِبْهُمْ سَيِّئَةٌۭ يَقُولُوا۟ هَـٰذِهِۦ مِنْ عِندِكَ ۚ قُلْ كُلٌّۭ مِّنْ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ فَمَالِ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ٱلْقَوْمِ لَا يَكَادُونَ يَفْقَهُونَ حَدِيثًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Death	will	come	to	you	wherever	you	may	
be,	even	if	 you	were	in	strong	 fortresses;	
if	some	good	reaches	them	they	say,	“This	
is	 from	 Allah”;	 and	 if	 any	 misfortune	
reaches	them,	they	say,	“This	is	from	you”;	say,	“Everything	is	from	Allah”;	what	is	wrong	with	
these	people,	that	they	do	not	seem	to	understand	anything?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	jahāñ	kaheeñ	ho	maut	tumheiñ	ā legi	
agar-che	 mazboot	 qil'oñ	 meiñ	 ho	 aur	
unheiñ	koi	bhalāi	pahoñche	 to	kaheñ	 yeh	
Allah	ki	taraf	se	hai	aur	unheiñ	koi	burāyi	
pahuñche	to	kaheñ	yeh	huzoor	ki	taraf	se	
āayi	tum	farmā	do	sab	Allah	ki	taraf	se	hai	
to	un	logoñ	ko	kiya	huwa	koi	bāt	samajh	te	m‘aloom	hi	nahi	hote.

arabicText: مَّآ أَصَابَكَ مِنْ حَسَنَةٍۢ فَمِنَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ وَمَآ أَصَابَكَ مِن سَيِّئَةٍۢ فَمِن نَّفْسِكَ ۚ وَأَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ لِلنَّاسِ رَسُولًۭا ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Whatever	 good	 reaches	 you,	 O	 listeners,	 is	 from	Allah,	 and	 whatever	 ill	 reaches	 you	 is	 from	
yourselves;	and	We	 have	 sent	 you	(O	 dear	Prophet	Muhammad - peace	 and	 blessings	 be	 upon	
him)	as	a	Noble	Messenger	towards	all	mankind;	and	Allah is	Sufficient,	as	a	Witness.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	sun	ne	wāle	tujhe	jo	bhalāi	pahuñche	woh	Allah	ki	taraf	se	hai	aur	jo	burāyi	pahuñche	woh	
teri	apni	taraf	se	hai	aur	aey	Mehboob ham	ne	tumheiñ	sab	logoñ	ke	liye	Rasool	bheja	aur	Allah	
kāfi	hai	gawāh.

arabicText: مَّن يُطِعِ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَقَدْ أَطَاعَ ٱللَّهَ ۖ وَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ فَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ عَلَيْهِمْ حَفِيظًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Whoever	obeys	 the	Noble	Messenger	has	
indeed	 obeyed	 Allah;	 and	 for	 those	 who	
turn	away	- We	have	not	sent	you	as	their	
saviour.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jis	ne	Rasool	ka	hukm	māna	beshak	us	ne	
Allah	 ka	 hukm	 māna	 aur	 jis	 ne	 mooñh	
phera	 to	 ham	 ne	 tumheiñ	 un	 ke	 bachāne	
ko	na	bheja

arabicText: وَيَقُولُونَ طَاعَةٌۭ فَإِذَا بَرَزُوا۟ مِنْ عِندِكَ بَيَّتَ طَآئِفَةٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ غَيْرَ ٱلَّذِى تَقُولُ ۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَكْتُبُ مَا يُبَيِّتُونَ ۖ فَأَعْرِضْ عَنْهُمْ وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلًا
englishTranslationText:
And	 they	 say,	 “We	 have	 obeyed”;	 and	
when	 they	go	away	 from	 you,	a	group	 of	
them	 spend	 the	 night	 conspiring	 against	
what	 they	 had	 said;	 and	 Allah records	
what	they	conspired	by	night;	therefore	O	
dear	 Prophet	 (Muhammad - peace	 and	
blessings	 be	 upon	 him)	 avoid	 them	 and	
rely	upon	Allah;	and	Allah is	Sufficient	as	
a	Trustee	(of	affairs).
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 kahte	 haiñ	 ham	 ne	 hukm	 māna	 phir	
jab	 tumhāre	 pās	 se	 nikal	 kar	jāte	 haiñ	 to	
un	 meiñ	 ek	 giroh	 jo	 kah	 gaya	 tha	 uske	
khilāf	 rāt	 ko	 mansūbe	 gānth-ta	 hai aur	
Allah	likh	rakhta	hai	un	ke	rāt	ke	mansūbe	
to	 aey	 Mehboob tum	 unse	 chashm	 poshi	
karo	aur	Allah	par	bharosa	karo	aur	Allah	
kāfi	hai	kām	banāne	ko.

arabicText: أَفَلَا يَتَدَبَّرُونَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ ۚ وَلَوْ كَانَ مِنْ عِندِ غَيْرِ ٱللَّهِ لَوَجَدُوا۟ فِيهِ ٱخْتِلَـٰفًۭا كَثِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
So	 do	 they	 not	 ponder	about	 the	Qur’an?	
And	 had	 it	 been	 from	 anyone	 besides	
Allah,	 they	 would	 certainly	 find	 much	
contradiction	in	it.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	kiya	ghaur	nahi	karte	Qur'ān	meiñ	aur	
agar	woh	ghair-e-khuda	ke	pās	se	hota	to	
zaroor	us	meiñ	bahut	ikhtilāf	pāte.

arabicText: وَإِذَا جَآءَهُمْ أَمْرٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْأَمْنِ أَوِ ٱلْخَوْفِ أَذَاعُوا۟ بِهِۦ ۖ وَلَوْ رَدُّوهُ إِلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ وَإِلَىٰٓ أُو۟لِى ٱلْأَمْرِ مِنْهُمْ لَعَلِمَهُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَسْتَنۢبِطُونَهُۥ مِنْهُمْ ۗ وَلَوْلَا فَضْلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَرَحْمَتُهُۥ لَٱتَّبَعْتُمُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	 when	 any	 news	 of	 safety	 or	 fear	
comes	 to	 them,	 they	 speak	 of	it	 publicly;
and	 had	 they	 referred	 it	 to	 the	 Noble	
Messenger	 and	 to	 those	 among	 them	
having	authority,	 those	among	 them	who	
are	able	to	infer	would	certainly	learn	the	
truth	of	the	matter	from	them;	and	were	it	
not	for	Allah’s	munificence	upon	you,	and	
His	mercy,	all	of	you	would	have	certainly	
followed	Satan	- except	a	few.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	jab	unke	pās	koi	bāt	itmenān	ya	dar	ki	
āati	 hai	 us	 ka	 charcha	 kar	 baith-te	 haiñ	
aur	 agar	 us	 meiñ	 Rasool	 aur	 apne	 ziikhtiyār	logoñ	ki	 taraf	ruju'	lāte	 to	zaroor	
un	 se	 uski	 haqeeqat	 jān	 lete	 yeh	 jo	 bāt	
meiñ	kāwish	karte	haiñ	aur	agar	 tum	par	
Allah	 ka	 fazl	 aur	 uski	 Rahmat	 na	 hoti	 to	
zaroor	 tum	 shaitān	 ke	 peeche	 lag	 jāte	
magar	thode.

arabicText: فَقَـٰتِلْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ لَا تُكَلَّفُ إِلَّا نَفْسَكَ ۚ وَحَرِّضِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ ۖ عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَكُفَّ بَأْسَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ أَشَدُّ بَأْسًۭا وَأَشَدُّ تَنكِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	O	dear	Prophet,	 fight	in	Allah's	
cause;	 you	 will	 not	 be	 burdened	 except	
for	yourself,	and	urge	the	believers	(to	fight);	it	is	likely	that	Allah will	curb	the	strength	of	the	
disbelievers;	and	Allah's	strike	is	most	stinging	and	His	punishment	the	most	severe.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	 aey	 Mehboob Allah	 ki	 rāh	 meiñ	 lado	 tum	 takleef	 na	 diye	 jāoge	 magar	 apne	 dam	 ki	 aur	
Musalmānoñ	 ko	 amādah karo	 qareeb	 hai	 ke	 Allah	 kāfiroñ	 ki	 sakhti	 rok	 de	 aur Allah	 ki	 ānch	
(Girift)	sab	se	sakht	tar	hai	aur	uska	‘azāb	sab	se	karra	(Zabardast	Sakht).

arabicText: مَّن يَشْفَعْ شَفَـٰعَةً حَسَنَةًۭ يَكُن لَّهُۥ نَصِيبٌۭ مِّنْهَا ۖ وَمَن يَشْفَعْ شَفَـٰعَةًۭ سَيِّئَةًۭ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كِفْلٌۭ مِّنْهَا ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ مُّقِيتًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Whoever	 makes	 a	 noble	 intercession	 will	 have	 a	 share	 of	 it,	 and	 whoever	 makes	 an	 evil	
intercession	will	have	a	share	of	it;	and	Allah is	Able	to	do	all	things
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jo	achchi	sifārish	kare	uske	liye	us	meiñ	se	hissa	hai	aur	jo	buri	sifārish	kare	uske	liye	us	meiñ	
se	hissa	hai	aur	Allah	har	cheez	par	qādir	hai
